info.name: Firefox App v.4 (Light)
info.description: Now Firefox looks like a Windows 10 app from Windows Store. Dark color scheme here.
info.additionalInfo:
v.2 changelog:
-bigger back button
-new reload, stop, go, downloads and panel UI buttons
v.3 changelog:
-hover animations on searchbar
-new speaker/mute buttons
-new urlbar autocomplete dropdown
-new downloads dropdown
-new panelUI menu
-new context menu
-close button on on hover
-some icons and colors optimization
v.4 changelog:
-new hi-res icons resources
-colors optimization
-new dark color scheme

data.title: Not working on windows vista completly
